about_the_game:
Earth is no longer the world it once was.
Once lush and thriving, it is now a husk—drained, desolate, on the brink of collapse. Humanity watches from towering space stations, floating high above their dying home. But no refuge lasts forever.

In a desperate attempt to undo their mistakes, humans created a new kind of being—robots. Built to heal, programmed to restore—humanity’s last, fragile hope. But power alone isn’t enough. They must learn. They must think. They must choose.

This is where you step in.

You are a teacher. Your job is to guide a robot, to prepare it for its mission. But teaching is more than instruction—it’s about understanding, growth, and purpose.

Together, you’ll face challenges, puzzles, and mysteries hidden behind humanity’s so-called salvation. You'll dive into mini-games, RPG mechanics, and an immersive story.

About This Demo

This is a playable prologue to the full game. It introduces the world, core mechanics, and the story that will unfold in the main game.

The demo sets the stage for your journey, offering a glimpse into the challenges and mysteries that lie ahead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Any modern processor (e.g., Intel Core i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (e.g., Intel HD Graphics) or any GPU
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card compatible with the OS
